CREATE DATABASE demoDB;
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-- DROP MASTER KEY;
-- GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password@123'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2024-11-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-07-29T18:30:11Z&st=2025-07-29T10:15:11Z&spr=https&sig=LJeiXC4Yk3ltgW2fuLkuWLRDNkpb5ijU2YWVJ4xLnxY%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDateSource WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://gen2storageacc1414.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredential
)
GO
